weapons.name: Wooden Training Sword
weapons.description: A simple wooden sword used for basic training. Light and easy to wield.

weapons.name: Iron Blade
weapons.description: A sturdy iron sword. Reliable for everyday battles.

weapons.name: Steel Longsword
weapons.description: A well-crafted steel longsword. Balanced and deadly.

weapons.name: Enchanted Staff
weapons.description: A mystical staff imbued with ancient magic. Channels wisdom into power.

weapons.name: Dragon Slayer
weapons.description: A legendary blade forged from dragon scales. Few can wield its immense power.

armor.name: Cloth Tunic
armor.description: Basic cloth armor. Better than nothing.

armor.name: Leather Vest
armor.description: Sturdy leather armor. Provides decent protection without hindering movement.

armor.name: Chainmail Armor
armor.description: Interlocking metal rings provide excellent protection.

armor.name: Mage Robes
armor.description: Enchanted robes that enhance magical abilities and mental fortitude.

armor.name: Plate Mail of the Ancients
armor.description: Legendary armor worn by ancient heroes. Provides unmatched protection.

accessories.name: Copper Ring
accessories.description: A simple copper ring. Provides a small boost to luck.

accessories.name: Silver Amulet
accessories.description: A silver amulet that sharpens the mind and brings good fortune.

accessories.name: Ring of Swiftness
accessories.description: A magical ring that enhances speed and reflexes.

accessories.name: Crown of Wisdom
accessories.description: An ancient crown that grants profound insight and knowledge.

accessories.name: Phoenix Feather Pendant
accessories.description: A pendant containing a genuine phoenix feather. Grants incredible resilience and fortune.

consumables.name: Strength Elixir
consumables.description: Temporarily increases strength by 5 for one battle.

consumables.name: Wisdom Scroll
consumables.description: Grants 100 bonus XP when used. Knowledge is power!

consumables.name: Lucky Charm
consumables.description: Increases luck by 10 for the next 3 battles.

questItems.name: Ancient Map Fragment
questItems.description: A torn piece of an ancient map. Might lead to hidden treasure.

questItems.name: Crystal Key
questItems.description: A mysterious crystalline key. It hums with magical energy.

questItems.name: Dragon Scale
questItems.description: A scale from an ancient dragon. Incredibly rare and valuable.

cosmetics.name: Adventurer's Hat
cosmetics.description: A stylish hat that makes you look like a seasoned adventurer.

cosmetics.name: Hero's Cape
cosmetics.description: A flowing cape that billows dramatically in the wind.

cosmetics.name: Golden Crown
cosmetics.description: A magnificent golden crown. Shows everyone you're royalty.
